feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.7
entry.content:
Fixed

  • A bug where "RuntimeError: failed to get urandom" was being raised upon importing attempt on Synology.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Fix missing urandom by using OpenSSL's random_bytes by @saschazepter in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/280

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.6...0.15.7

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.8
entry.content:
Added

  • User can now select between "Raw" and "Simplified" mode in the map controls. "Simplified" mode will show less points, improving the map performance. "Raw" mode will show all points.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Bump chartkick from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/349
  • Points rendering mode by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.7...0.15.8

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.9
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Stats distance calculation now correctly calculates the daily distances.

Changed

  • Refactored the stats calculation process to make it more efficient.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Fix stats distances and rework stas calculating service by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.8...0.15.9

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.10
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Data migration that prevented the application from starting.

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.9...0.15.10

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.15.11
entry.content:
Added

  • Importing Immich data on the Imports page now will trigger an attempt to write raw json file with the data from Immich to tmp/imports/immich_raw_data_CURRENT_TIME_USER_EMAIL.json file. This is useful to debug the problem with the import if it fails. #270

Fixed

  • New app version is now being checked every 6 hours instead of 1 day and the check is being performed in the background. #238

Changed

  • ‚ö†Ô∏è The instruction to import Records.json from Google Takeout now mentions tmp/imports directory instead of public/imports. ‚ö†Ô∏è #326
  • Hostname definition for Sidekiq healtcheck to solve #344. See the diff:

diff dawarich_sidekiq: image: freikin/dawarich:latest container_name: dawarich_sidekiq healthcheck: - test: [ "CMD-SHELL", "bundle exec sidekiqmon processes | grep $(hostname)" ] + test: [ "CMD-SHELL", "bundle exec sidekiqmon processes | grep ${HOSTNAME}" ]

  • Renamed directories used by app and sidekiq containers for gems cache to fix #339:

```diff dawarich_app: image: freikin/dawarich:latest container_name: dawarich_sidekiq volumes: - - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems + - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems_app

...

dawarich_sidekiq: image: freikin/dawarich:latest container_name: dawarich_sidekiq volumes: - - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems + - gem_cache:/usr/local/bundle/gems_sidekiq ```

üíô This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon üíô

What's Changed

  • Bump pg from 1.5.8 to 1.5.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/357
  • Bump rubocop-rails from 2.26.2 to 2.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/358
  • Bump sidekiq from 7.3.2 to 7.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/359
  • Bump factory_bot_rails from 6.4.3 to 6.4.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/360
  • Bump rails from 7.2.1.1 to 7.2.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/361

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.15.10...0.15.11
